tool_description: Instagram Manage API tool for User, feed, followers, like, follow, unfollow
name: Instagram Manage API
title: Instagram Manage API

api_list.name: FollowUser
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-manage-api.p.rapidapi.com/followUser"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-manage-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
